func_sig.description: Find relatively prime pairs (m, n) from an integer k represented as k = m/n.
func_sig.name: find_prime_pairs

k.description: The integer representing the ratio m/n.

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its base and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_triangle_area

base.description: The length of the base of the triangle.

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a shape (circle, triangle, etc.) based on shape type and its dimensions.
func_sig.name: calculate_area

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the shape. For circle: {"radius": value}. For triangle: {"base": value, "height": value}.

func_sig.description: Calculates the surface area of a cube given the length of an edge.
func_sig.name: calculate_surface_area_of_cube

edge_length.description: The length of one edge of the cube.

func_sig.description: Calculate the volume of a cone given its radius and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_volume_of_cone

radius.description: The radius of the cone's base.

func_sig.description: Calculate the volume of a right circular cylinder given its radius and height.
func_sig.name: calculate_cylinder_volume

radius.description: The radius of the cylinder's base.
